mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(max(measure_num), 0) FROM support_resistance WHERE tag = '1' AND mine_id = #{mineId} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY SUBSTRING(measure_num, -4) DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT measure_num FROM support_resistance as sr
sr.mine_id = #{mineId} AND sr.del_flag = '0'
AND sr.survey_area_name like concat('%',#{surveyAreaName},'%')

SELECT sr.support_resistance_id AS dataId, sr.measure_num AS measureNum, sr.workface_id AS workFaceId, sr.sensor_location AS sensorLocation, sr.sensor_type AS sensorType FROM support_resistance sr
sr.mine_id = #{mineId} AND sr.del_flag = '0'
AND ( sr.sensor_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR sr.workface_id IN ( SELECT bw.workface_id FROM biz_workface bw WHERE bw.workface_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND bw.del_flag = '0' AND bw.mine_id = #{mineId} ) )
GROUP BY sr.data_time DESC
